name: 520-project-safari-chiru-dunbar
description: This project aims to explore and visualize Canadian immigration patterns to different major cities through the lens of the languages spoken.  By combining demographic and linguistic datasets, we will create a narrative that illustrates how different immigrant communities cluster in major Canadian cities, showcasing the cultural and linguistic profile of each major city center.
author: Habibullah Safari, Melania Chiru, Talon Dunbar

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
